branchCategory.name: IP200, Cylinder Positioner
branchCategory.description: <p>Series IP200 cylinder positioner offers precise and stable position control of small bore cylinders. The IP200 can be used as a cylinder position control unit for process control, servomechanism and general industrial machines.</p>
